data.question: What is the general formula for homochiral lanthanide bisphosphonates synthesized in the study?
Which lanthanides were used in the synthesis of homochiral lanthanide bisphosphonates?
data.answer: La, Ce, Pr, Nd, Sm, Gd, Tb

data.question: What method was used to determine the absence of methanol in the synthesized compounds?
data.answer: Qualitative NMR study of guest species

data.question: How was the framework stability of the synthesized compounds tested?
data.answer: Using powder X-ray diffraction techniques after evacuation and exposure to water vapor

data.question: What was the yield of mandelonitrile when benzaldehyde was treated with cyanotrimethylsilane in the presence of desolvated 1e?

What was the role of 6M HCl in the synthesis of homochiral lanthanide bisphosphonates?
data.answer: To re-dissolve the precipitated solid during the synthesis process

data.question: Why were the samples evacuated before being used in catalytic reactions?
data.answer: To remove guest water molecules and prepare the catalyst

data.question: How does the presence of both Lewis and Brönsted acid sites in the compounds affect their catalytic activity?
data.answer: It enables them to catalyze several organic transformations including cyanosilylation of aldehydes and ring opening of meso-carboxylic anhydrides

data.question: What was the effect of dehydration and rehydration on the structure of the synthesized compounds?
data.answer: It caused a distortion of the long-range lamellar-type structure while preserving the local coordination environments
